title: A Little Princess (Part 20)
description: Mr. Carrisford's lawyer returns from his travels with bad news. He was unable to locate Captain Crewe's daughter. But when Sara visits the Indian gentleman to return his monkey, Carrisford realizes that she is the girl they have been searching far and wide to find. Sara is shocked to learn the truth: for two years, Carrisford has been searching for her—and all the while, she was living next door.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand the story
